Day 2
=====

Sequence Modeling
- Basics of Modeling Sequences
- Represent sequences as tensors


Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)
- Basic Mechanics
- Exercise: Character-RNN
- Gated Variants (LSTM and GRU)
- Structural Variants (Bidirectional, Stacked, Tree)

Structured Prediction Methods
- Greedy Selection
- Monte Carlo methods
- Beam Search
- Viterbi Decoding

Sequence-to-Sequence Problems
- Translation
- Summarization
- Tagging (POS, BIO, etc)

Advanced Topics
- Attention
- Sequence-to-Sequence
- Memory Networks
